headline: Should You Buy Devon Energy Stock With Oil Prices Below $70 a Barrel?
summary: Oil prices have bounced around quite a bit this year.  Crude oil pricing has a significant impact on the cash flows of oil producers like Devon Energy (NYSE: DVN).  Here's a look at whether the current oil price affects the buy thesis for the oil stock.
